opis: Pi6. An earbud that defines excellence in its True Wireless category. Class-leading audio performance, bespoke ANC and crystal-clear call quality with the comfort and elegance of a highly considered earbud design.

opis: What does it take to create category-defining True Wireless earbuds? High-resolution sound and crystal-clear voice calls, an industry-first wireless audio retransmission case, plus a choice of three elegant colors.

specifikacije.Wearing style: In-ear noise canceling True Wireless headphones
specifikacije.Drive units: 9.2mm Dynamic Drive with Balanced Armature
specifikacije.Microphones: Three microphones per earbud for calls and ANC

 Adaptive ANC

 Wireless and USB-C charging

opis: Nothing looks, or sounds, quite like Nautilus™. A revolution when it first launched 30 years ago and still an icon today, its ethos informs everything we do. Nautilus comes in three standard colors: Midnight Blue, Black, and Silver. We also offer a special service that can match any color from a sample or color reference.

Panorama 3 is a Dolby Atmos-enabled, Amazon Alexa-compatible, home theater powerhouse in a single, elegant component. Bowers & Wilkins draws on its decades of collaboration with the world's most famous recording studios to deliver stunning sound.

opis: Our flagship center-channel speaker features a Carbon Dome drive unit housed in a Tweeter-On-Top enclosure, a 130mm (5in) Continuum Cone FST™ midrange driver - particularly important for clarity with dialogue - and twin Aerofoil™ Profile bass cones. It's the perfect partner for the 705 S3, 703 S3 and 702 S3.

opis: Where versatility and discretion are concerned, M-1 has them in abundance. It’s equally suited to multi-channel or stereo sound, is an outstanding listen with or without a subwoofer, and comes complete with wall-bracket and table stand.

opis:
M-1 is among our smallest and most adaptable speakers, and the bespoke FS-M-1 stand only adds to its versatility. Available in matte black or matte white, FS-M-1 allows for perfect acoustic placement and facilitates outstanding performance in any environment.
*Speaker not included.

Take five compact, discreet and high-performance M-1 speakers. Add the punchy, powerful and yet equally unassuming ASW608 subwoofer. The result is a high-performance, full-range surround sound system for television, music and movies.

Marine 6 is a two-way loudspeaker with a 25mm (1-in) tweeter and a 150mm (6-in) polypropylene bass/midrange driver. It boasts an IP66 rating for incredible ruggedness when installed, and is the more compact of the Marine loudspeakers, fitting into a depth of 88mm (3.5-in) with a cut-out of 200mm (7.8-in).

specifikacije.Drive units:
1x Ø25mm (1-in) soft dome tweeter 
 1x Ø150mm (6-in) polypropylene 
 cone bass/midrange

opis: Marine 8 is a two-way loudspeaker with a 25mm (1-in) tweeter and a 200mm (8-in) polypropylene bass/midrange driver. It boasts an IP66 rating for incredible ruggedness when installed, and although it is the larger of the Marine loudspeakers it fits into a shallow depth of 93mm (3.7-in) with a cut-out of 249mm (9.8-in).

specifikacije.Drive units:
1x Ø25mm (1-in) soft dome tweeter 
 1x Ø200mm (8-in) polypropylene 
 cone bass/midrange

opis:
M-1 is among our smallest and most adaptable speakers, and the bespoke FS-M-1 stand only adds to its versatility. Available in matte black or matte white, FS-M-1 allows for perfect acoustic placement and facilitates outstanding performance in any environment.
*Speaker not included.

Produced specifically to complement the look, finish, and design of your Zeppelin, this wall bracket will elevate your Zeppelin ownership experience both literally and metaphorically. Let your music take center stage.

Dimensions: 170mm (6.7in) x 79mm (3.1in) x 84mm (3.3in).

Fits 2021 Zeppelin only.

Comes with bracket with interface section, screw cover, screws and manual. Wall attachment screws not included.

Experience flawless stereo focus and soundstaging with stands designed by our acoustic team for your Formation Duo wireless stereo speakers. Position Duo at the perfect height, give Duo the perfect support, then sit back and let their performance transport you.

Enjoy optimum performance from your Formation Flex with this floor stand by Vogel’s. With the speaker at the perfect height for seated listening, it’s ideal for using Flex as part of a surround-sound system or for stereo listening.

See www.vogels.com for more information.

*Sold singly
Get the best possible performance from your 600 Series stand-mount speakers with the dedicated speaker stand.
Achieve the best possible performance for your 805 D4 loudspeakers with these dedicated stands.

No matter if you simply need to save space, or you want to involve your Formation Flex in a home cinema or stereo system, this wall bracket from Vogel’s is ideal. Tilt and rotate your Flex into precisely the position you want.

See www.vogels.com for more information.

*Sold singly
The stand-mount speakers in the 700 Series work best on our elegant FS_700 S3 stands, which are available in black and silver finishes.

Get ultimate positional flexibility for your Formation Wedge wireless speaker with our specially designed wall bracket. Optimized support for maximum audio enjoyment - and your Formation Wedge can be the center of attention, or as discreet as can be, at the same time.
Owners of either the HTM81 D4 or HTM82 D4 can get the best from their center speakers with this dedicated stand, which fits both perfectly.

dodatne_informacije.tagline: Flagship HTM81 D4 or HTM82 D4 centre-speaker stand

opis: Experience flawless stereo focus and soundstaging with stands designed by our acoustic team for your Formation Duo wireless stereo speakers. Position Duo at the perfect height, give Duo the perfect support, then sit back and let their performance transport you.

The Formation Wedge wireless speaker delivers room-filling audio from one stylishly shaped and finished speaker. Five precisely angled drivers provide true stereo sound, making Wedge the hi-res speaker that sounds even better than it looks.

opis: What does it take to create category-defining True Wireless earbuds? High-resolution sound and crystal-clear voice calls, an industry-first wireless audio retransmission case, plus a choice of three elegant colors.

specifikacije.Wearing style: In-ear noise canceling True Wireless headphones
specifikacije.Drive units: 9.2mm Dynamic Drive with Balanced Armature
specifikacije.Microphones: Three microphones per earbud for calls and ANC
specifikacije.Technical features:
True 24-bit audio connection 
 2-way drive unit design 
 High performance DSP 
 Bluetooth 5.0 with aptX™ Adaptive technology 
 Adaptive ANC 
 Audio retransmission from charging case 
 Wireless and USB-C charging 
 Fast charging support
specifikacije.Battery life & charging:
Up to 5 hours for earbuds (with ANC off) 
 Additional 16 hours from charging case 
 15 minute charge = 2 hours playback
specifikacije.Inputs:
Earbuds: Bluetooth 
 Charging case: USB-C & 3.5 mm analogue jack (wireless audio retransmission via charging case)
specifikacije.Frequency band:
Tx mode: 2402MHz to 2480MHZ, ISM Band 
 Rx mode: 2402MHz to 2480MHz, ISM Band
specifikacije.In box accessories:
80 cm USB-C to USB-C charging cable 
 80 cm 3.5 mm jack to USB-C audio cable 
 Small / Medium / Large ear tips

Satin Black 
 Canvas White 
 Midnight Blue

opis: Px7 S2e is the latest iteration of our highly successful entry-level wireless headphones. The ‘e’ stands for ‘evolved’, as the Px7 S2e takes inspiration and learnings from our flagship Px8 wireless headphones, together with a re-tuned acoustic performance, to deliver the very best sound in its class.
